sql:
select  Zid as Id_Zid,imp as imp_w{window},clk as clk_w{window},  toDate('{target_day:%Y-%m-%d}') as EventDate
from
( 
select
    Zid,
    count(*) as imp

from
    audience.imp
where
    EventDate<  toDate('{target_day:%Y-%m-%d}')
    and EventDate> toDate('{target_day:%Y-%m-%d}')-{window}
    and Account={account}
    and Vendor={vendor}
    and Zid GLOBAL in (
    select
        distinct toString(Id_Zid)
    from
        zampda.rtb_all
    where
        EventDate=toDate('{target_day:%Y-%m-%d}')
        and Bid_CompanyId={account}
        and Media_VendorId={vendor}
        and notEmpty(Impression.Timestamp)
        and Device_Os='android'
        and has(Segment.Id,100000+{account})=0
    )
group by Zid
) 
any full join(


select
    Zid,
    count(*) as clk

from
    audience.clk
where
    EventDate<  toDate('{target_day:%Y-%m-%d}')
    and EventDate> toDate('{target_day:%Y-%m-%d}')-{window}
    and Account={account}
    and Vendor={vendor}
    and Zid GLOBAL in (
    select
        distinct toString(Id_Zid)
    from
        zampda.rtb_all
    where
        EventDate=toDate('{target_day:%Y-%m-%d}')
        and Bid_CompanyId={account}
        and Media_VendorId={vendor}
        and notEmpty(Impression.Timestamp)
        and Device_Os='android'
        and has(Segment.Id,100000+{account})=0
    )
group by Zid

) USing Zid
name: av_ctr_day_window{window}
